abstract: IOUserAudioDevice  SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored Instance MethodSetWantsStreamFormatsRestoredDriverKit 21.0+void SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored(bool in_wants_stream_formats_restored); Parameters in_wants_stream_formats_restoredBool value indicating if the host should or should not restore the stream formats for the device A value of false indicates that the stream formats for the device should NOT be saved/restored A value of true indicated that the stream formats for the device should be saved/restored
overview:
IOUserAudioDevice  SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored Instance MethodSetWantsStreamFormatsRestoredDriverKit 21.0+void SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored(bool in_wants_stream_formats_restored); Parameters in_wants_stream_formats_restoredBool value indicating if the host should or should not restore the stream formats for the device A value of false indicates that the stream formats for the device should NOT be saved/restored A value of true indicated that the stream formats for the device should be saved/restored

Setter on the device object that tells the host that the stream formats for the device should or should not be saved/restored when the device is first published. If the device doesn’t implement this property, it is assumed that the settings should be saved and restored. Note that this should be set before the device is published to the host.

# SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ AudioDriverKit ](/documentation/audiodriverkit)

- [ IOUserAudioDevice ](/documentation/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiodevice)

- [ SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored ](/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioDevice/SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored)

- [ IOUserAudioDevice ](/documentation/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiodevice)

-  SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored 

Instance Method# SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored

DriverKit 21.0+

```
void SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored(bool in_wants_stream_formats_restored);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioDevice/SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored#parameters)

`in_wants_stream_formats_restored`Bool value indicating if the host should or should not restore the stream formats for the device A value of false indicates that the stream formats for the device should NOT be saved/restored A value of true indicated that the stream formats for the device should be saved/restored

## [Discussion](/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioDevice/SetWantsStreamFormatsRestored#discussion)

Setter on the device object that tells the host that the stream formats for the device should or should not be saved/restored when the device is first published. If the device doesn’t implement this property, it is assumed that the settings should be saved and restored. Note that this should be set before the device is published to the host.
